original_title: 修罗新娘- Tu La Tân Nương.
overview: On the night of her wedding to General Xiao Kian, princess Wang Xuan transformed into a ghostly Asura Bride, killing and destroying every guest, even the three princes. Ziheng, who was a childhood sweetheart, were terrified. However, Xiao Ji did not leave him, and together with Wang Xuan to find the truth, he did not expect to involve a bigger conspiracy behind him.
title: Asura Bride
